subtitle: GET IN TOUCH
title: Answers to Common Questions Before We Get to Work

items.title: Do I need a big budget?
items.text: Not at all. We work with a wide range of budgets and offer flexible solutions to help you get the most value for your investment. Whether it's a small repair or a full remodel, we'll find a way that works for you.

items.title: How long does a typical roofing job take?
items.text: Most residential roofing jobs take 1–3 days, depending on the size and complexity. We’ll give you a clear timeline during your estimate.

items.title: Can I stay in my home during renovations?
items.text: In most cases, yes! We do our best to minimize disruption. For larger projects, we’ll discuss what to expect and help you plan accordingly.

items.title: What fencing material is best for my yard?
items.text: It depends on your priorities—privacy, durability, maintenance, or style. We’ll walk you through the pros and cons of wood, vinyl, iron, and other options.

items.title: How much will my project cost?
items.text: Every project is different. We offer free, no-pressure estimates so you can get a clear idea of the scope and pricing before making any decisions.
